SELECT CONCAT ( A.MENU_NM , IF(B.MENU_NM != '', CONCAT(' > ', B.MENU_NM), '') , IF(C.MENU_NM != '', CONCAT(' > ', C.MENU_NM), '') ) AS MENU_NAME , A.MENU_ID AS LV1_ID , B.MENU_ID AS LV2_ID , C.MENU_ID AS LV3_ID FROM RAA93B A INNER JOIN RAA93B B ON A.URL_DVD_CD = B.URL_DVD_CD AND A.MENU_LV = 1 AND B.MENU_LV = 2 LEFT JOIN RAA93B C ON B.URL_DVD_CD = C.URL_DVD_CD AND C.MENU_LV = 3 WHERE 1=1
AND ( A.MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuNm} ,'%') OR B.MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuNm} ,'%') OR C.MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuNm} ,'%') )
ORDER BY A.SRT_NO ASC , B.SRT_NO ASC , C.SRT_NO ASC

SELECT 93b.srt_no , 93b.menu_id , 95b.rght_cd , 93b.menu_lv , 93b.dlt_f , 95b.mdfy_rght_ccd , 93b.hndl_dy_tm , 93b.hndl_p_eno FROM RAA93B 93b LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM RAA95B WHERE rght_cd = #{rghtCd}) 95b ON 93b.menu_id = 95b.menu_id WHERE 93b.scrn_aplc_type_cd = 'S' ORDER BY srt_no
